text: New movies coming to Netflix next month include classics from the Wachowskis, Tarantino and Haneke. Netflix may have cancelled the Wachowski ’ s cult hit “ Sense 8, ” but its adding two of their defining works to its streaming library next month. All three entries in “ The Matrix ” trilogy are heading to Netflix, as is the ambitious “ Cloud Atlas, ” which means you ’ ll be able to bring summer to an end by bingeing mind - melting science fiction.
